structure.name: Mime
structure.declaration: /** * ICalMimeParseFunc: * @bytes: (array length=size) (element-type gchar): the bytes to process * @size: the length of the bytes array * @user_data: the user data * * Returns: A #ICalComponent as a string */ typedef gchar *(*ICalMimeParseFunc)(gchar *bytes, size_t size, gpointer user_data);

method.name: i_cal_mime_parse
method.comment: Parses data to #ICalComponent using the given function.
